card.flame_wave.type_1.title: Flame Wave
card.flame_wave.type_1.description: Unleashes a wave of fire that burns all enemies in its path.
card.healing_light.type_1.title: Healing Light
card.healing_light.type_1.description: Bathes allies in a warm light, restoring their health.
card.stone_spike.type_2.title: Stone Spike
card.stone_spike.type_2.description: Summons a massive spike from the ground to impale enemies.
card.venom_cloud.type_3.title: Venom Cloud
card.venom_cloud.type_3.description: Releases a poisonous cloud that damages enemies over time.
card.arcane_shield.type_1.title: Arcane Shield
card.arcane_shield.type_1.description: Creates a magical shield that absorbs incoming damage.
card.frost_blast.type_1.title: Frost Blast
card.frost_blast.type_1.description: Unleashes a blast of icy energy, slowing enemies.
card.thunder_clap.type_1.title: Thunder Clap
card.thunder_clap.type_1.description: Calls down a thunderous strike to stun enemies.
card.wind_barrier.type_3.title: Wind Barrier
card.wind_barrier.type_3.description: Summons a barrier of wind that deflects attacks.
card.light_arrow.type_1.title: Light Arrow
card.light_arrow.type_1.description: Fires a radiant arrow that pierces through enemies.
card.shadow_strike.type_1.title: Shadow Strike
card.shadow_strike.type_1.description: Strikes from the shadows to deal massive damage.
card.crystal_barrier.type_2.title: Crystal Barrier
card.crystal_barrier.type_2.description: Creates a barrier of crystal to protect allies.
card.phantom_dagger.type_1.title: Phantom Dagger
card.phantom_dagger.type_1.description: Throws an ethereal dagger that seeks its target.
card.blazing_sphere.type_3.title: Blazing Sphere
card.blazing_sphere.type_3.description: Summons a fiery sphere that explodes on impact.
card.mystic_flare.type_1.title: Mystic Flare
card.mystic_flare.type_1.description: Releases a burst of arcane energy that scorches enemies.
card.celestial_hammer.type_1.title: Celestial Hammer
card.celestial_hammer.type_1.description: Calls forth a hammer from the heavens to crush enemies.
card.storm_burst.type_1.title: Storm Burst
card.storm_burst.type_1.description: Unleashes a burst of storm energy that damages and stuns enemies.
card.void_nova.type_2.title: Void Nova
card.void_nova.type_2.description: Creates a nova of void energy that weakens enemies.
card.radiant_blast.type_1.title: Radiant Blast
card.radiant_blast.type_1.description: Fires a powerful beam of radiant energy at enemies.
card.ethereal_wave.type_3.title: Ethereal Wave
card.ethereal_wave.type_3.description: Sends out a wave of ethereal energy that confuses enemies.
card.starfall.type_1.title: Starfall
card.starfall.type_1.description: Calls down a rain of stars to damage all enemies.
